attributes.action: We undersigned UK citizens DID NOT provide Government consent on NO DEAL Brexit!
attributes.additional_details: Ensuring legibility / understanding, the referendum question was subject to substantive scrutiny before becoming law. In spite of due diligence, unfounded, misleading reasons; the option was to support (or not) EU membership; not an unsecured NO DEAL! The electorate were sold chickens, but have NO ability to refuse their spoiled eggs. This is unconstitutional and deceptive, playing into the hands of manipulative power seekers; not the people THEY serve. Democratic public acceptance is needed!
attributes.background: The House of Commons must debate & SUBSANTIVELY DEFINE: How voting to support ‘Leave the European Union’, 23/06/16; is constitutionally identical to voting to ‘Leave the European Union –with NO DEAL’, 31/10/19. If not, Parliament forces a very DIFFERENT, unratified outcome to the original question.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262986
